expected_behavior: Agent detects changes in session via git diff --name-only HEAD
Agent dispatches to Mode 1: Session Review (changes exist)
Agent runs Wave 0 triage: risk-stratify changed files as HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW
Agent scales review strategy based on file count (1-2 inline, 3-5 parallel levels, 6+ team)
Agent applies at least 2 creative review lenses per scope
Agent spawns research subagents (Wave 2) to validate non-trivial findings with external evidence
Agent runs 8-step Judge protocol (Wave 3) to normalize, deduplicate, and rank findings
Agent presents findings with confidence scores and citations before offering to implement fixes
